summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4004 for the improvement of the alley in block 47, S.A. Bell's 2nd Addition, Block 114, A.A. Denny's Broadway Addition and Block 5, 12th Avenue Addition, being the alley between Boren Avenue and Minor Avenue, from Pike Street to Union Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48626, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
